title: Halab
author: Halab
created_time: December 01, 2023, 09:56:34 AMLast edit: January 09, 2025, 05:09:41 PM by Halab
content: Hi there,For the last years, I've been organizing this little contest. First in the french section, now here since 2022.The idea is to make a small fictitious portfolio on January 1st 2024 and to see on December 31 2024 who has performed the best.Suppose that you have 1000$ and you want to make a small portfolio with 4 altcoins. Which ones do you choose and in what proportion ?Restrictions :You can not take BTC (or wrapped BTC etc...).You are not allowed to put more than 50% of your portfolio in one altcoin.You must put at least 5% of your portfolio in each altcoin.You can only take one stable coin (or none).Take at least one altcoin beyond the 100th position on Coingecko.Warning : before choosing an alt, check that on Coingecko, there is a tab Historical data (ex : Bitcoin). If on 01/01/2024, there is no price for your token, it is like playing with 3 Alts.Explanation :As the reference "buy" price, I will take the opening price reported by Coingecko in the historical data of 01/01/2024.And the closing price of 31/12/2024 will be used as reference "sale" price.The one who will see his or her fictitious portfolio progress the most in terms of value will be declared the big winner.Whoever bets on the best performing altcoin at the end of 2024 will receive a 100$ bonus on the value of his final portfolio.Whoever bets on the lowest performing altcoin at the end of 2024 will receive a 100$ penalty on the value of his final portfolio.Who can participate ?Anyone as long as you have reached the Member rank. You must have received 5 merits between the last 120 days and just before this post.You must not have any legitimate negative feedback from a DT member (I will decide whether or not a feedback is legitimate).No multi-accounts, thank you.Registration end date: 30/12/2023 11:59pm (Paris time). Registration is now closed.  And what we can win ?There will be 3 winners :1st : 0.0025 BTC + 0.004 BTC *2nd : 0.0010 BTC + 0.002 BTC *3rd : 0.0005 BTC + 0.001 BTC ** 5+2 mBTC is generously offered by bc.game.Please note that if by luck (or misfortune, it depends ), I'am on the podium, the rewards will not be shifted and the 4th will receive nothing.Once the contest is over and the ranking is clear (I'll give you a few days to check if everything is OK, I can make mistakes), winners will be contacted by PM to ask for their BTC addresses and I'll send them their rewards. If there is no answer from a winner within 7 days, I will contact the 4th, then the 5th, etc... Rewards will be sent at the same time. Of course, your account should not be banned at the end of the contest. This contest lasts one year, be aware of this.The aim of this contest is to have a little fun (and to confirm that daddy BTC is still strong). The rewards are just there to spice things up a bit, like a bet between friends. In previous years, some people have added extra rewards. I'm not asking for anything, but if someone wants to make the rewards bigger, he is free to do so. But let's be clear: he's committed to pay the winners, otherwise his Trust page is likely to get colored. Under no circumstances I will claim the extra rewards, as I don't want to be responsible for other people's money (I could be hacked or hit by a bus tomorrow, etc...). Please register in this form (replace the information between '<...>') (and make sure that the total is 100%) :Code:[table][tr][td]<Alt 1>[/td][td]<proportion %>[/td][td]<link on Coingecko>[/td][td]<rank on Coingecko>[/td][/tr][tr][td]<Alt 2>[/td][td]<proportion %>[/td][td]<link on Coingecko>[/td][td]<rank on Coingecko>[/td][/tr][tr][td]<Alt 3>[/td][td]<proportion %>[/td][td]<link on Coingecko>[/td][td]<rank on Coingecko>[/td][/tr][tr][td]<Alt 4>[/td][td]<proportion %>[/td][td]<link on Coingecko>[/td][td]<rank on Coingecko>[/td][/tr][/table]Good luck to all.May the halving be with us .Edit :You can follow the ranking on a daily basis thanks to LoyceV hereGraphs provided by n0nce :And :Quote from: paid2 on January 01, 2024, 03:17:36 PMI have created a public tracking portfolio for each participant. It's more pleasant to follow them this way I think.libert19 : https://cointracking.info/portfolio/libert19xSkylarx : https://cointracking.info/portfolio/xSkylarx0000shahzadafzal : comments.author: xSkylarx
comments.body: Quote from: Halab on December 01, 2023, 09:56:34 AM You must have received 5 merits between the last 120 days and just before this post.Question about this. Am I still qualified if my merit will be less than 5 on registration end date which is Dec. 31 2023.

comments.author: Halab
comments.body: Quote from: xSkylarx on December 02, 2023, 01:48:13 PMQuestion about this. Am I still qualified if my merit will be less than 5 on registration end date which is Dec. 31 2023.Yes, you're just good. What counts is the date of the first post of this topic and the last 120 days preceding it.

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Two years ago (2022), I won by picking stable coins before the bear market hit. Now, with the Bitcoin halving next year, I'm not going to do that.This year (2023), I started with this:Quote29. LoyceV: $1000.00Tether Price (499.93691945 USDT): $500.00 Monero Price (2.71518292 XMR): $400.00 Dogecoin Price (711.30830865 DOGE): $50.00 TryHards Price (22347.62420683 TRY): $50.00 And now I'm here (ignore the small change in amount of coins):Quote39. LoyceV: $1046.04Tether Price (500.00000000 USDT): $499.79 Monero Price (2.71499355 XMR): $463.18 Dogecoin Price (710.85330831 DOGE): $67.36 TryHards Price (22253.57503683 TRY): $15.71 Not very impressive, which is why I'm not into trading altcoins The last one went as expected:Quote from: LoyceV on December 02, 2022, 10:36:34 AMI've added TryHards just because it sounds cool. And because it's seriously far down the list. Obviously I don't have very high hopes for this one, so don't take this as investment advice.1. For 2024, I have high hopes for privacy coin Monero now that theymos is going to ban advertising mixers, so that's my first and largest pick.2. I still have hopes for this:Quote from: LoyceV on December 02, 2022, 10:36:34 AMAfter thinking about it for a while, I added Doge, because the damn thing bubbles up once in a while. Who knows, it might do it again.So I'll add Doge again.3. My third pick is going to be Stellar Lumens, because it also seems to bubble up every 4-ish years. Although extrapolating the graph, that's going to happen in 2025. In that case I'll just add it again the year after.4. That leaves the shittiest of all shitcoins, down even further than the Top 100. I'll just pick #101, which I've never seen before.To summarize, this is my 2024 portfolio:Monero50%https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/monero26Dogecoin25%https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/dogecoin10Stellar20%https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/stellar24Sei5%https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/sei101Good luck to all!
